column2: 1 egg - Crack the egg into a bowl and gently beat it. Toast the two slices of bread. Heat a pan over medium heat and spread a little butter on it. Pour the egg into the pan and cook until lightly browned. Serve the egg asdasdover the toast.

column7: start by heating some oil in a pan over medium heat. Next
column8: add in diced onion and garlic and cook until fragrant. Add in the cooked rice and mix with the onion mix. Push the mixture to one side of the pan and crack the eggs into the other side. Once the eggs have cooked
column9: mix them with the rice. Finally
column10: add in soy sauce and mix until everything is evenly coated. Enjoy your fried rice!
